Grace Adams (amụrụ n'ụbọchị nke abụọ n'ọnwa Nọvemba n'afọ 1995) bụ onye Ghana na-agba bọọlụ nke na-agba dịka onye na-agba ọsọ n'etiti maka klọb National Women's League Berry Ladies na ndị otu ụmụ nwanyị nke Ghana.

Adams malitere ọrụ ya na Ghana na Prison Ladies, tupu ọ kwaga United States iji gaa n'ihu na agụmakwụkwọ ya na ọrụ ya dị ka nwa akwụkwọ na-eme egwuregwu. Ọ debanyere aha na Mahadum nke South Florida site na 2015 ruo 2018, na-egwuri egwu maka klọb ha South Florida Bulls na American Athletic Conference Ọ meriri n'afọ 2017.

N'abalị iri na isii n'ọnwa Ọgọstụ n'afọ 2019, ọ sonyeere ndị otu Rivers Angels nke Nigeria Women Premier League na nkwekọrịta otu afọ. Na 24 Jenụwarị 2020 Adams kwagara Lebanọn, na-etinye aka na SAS n'etiti oge 2019 na 20. Ọ gbara bọọlụ asaa maka klọb ọhụrụ ya, nyere goolu ise aka; o nyeere ndị otu ya aka imeri league.
Adams laghachiri Ghana, na-egwuri egwu maka Berry Ladies na National Women's League.
Adams bụ onyeisi ndị na-erubeghị afọ 20 na 2014 FIFA U-20 Women's World Cup
N'abalị iri atọ n'ọnwa Nọvemba 2020, Adams nọchitere anya ndị otu okenye na egwuregwu enyi na enyi megide Morocco, na-abịa na nkeji nke iri asatọ na mmeri 2.
